name: Elf simulator
description:
Hi! I am back. I made this game in around 3 days. Anyway, before you play, here is the story:

Santa is going bankrupt and has an idea. Send you in a little stall to give out presents to children. Make a profit or else it's game over! Remember I am just a kid so while this game is fun, it is not a AAA experience. Have a good Christmas and you are ready to play!
